EmailTemplate.name: MW_Invoice Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Proforma Invoice
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Please see the attached invoice for the {!Opportunity.Name} project, including pricing, lead times and payment information. Orders are released upon receipt of invoice approval and payment. If you have any questions, feedback or revisions, reply to this email.
For payment options please refer to the last page of your proforma invoice.
Thank you,
{!Opportunity.Ops_Contact__c}
